content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = split(md, "\n\n")  # Split on double blank lines (code blocks end)

    extracted_code = join(code_blocks, '\n'))  # Join with newline and remove code fences

    return extracted_code
end
```
The `extract_julia_code` function takes a markdown document as input and extracts all the Julia code blocks. It then removes the code fence marks and joins the code blocks together with a newline. Finally, it returns the extracted code as a string.
